improvements.title: Migration to Env Based available on Project's Advanced tab
description: From now on, you can start the migration flow to the new Env Based workflow directly form the Advanced tab available in the Project's Settings section.

improvements.title: Model used by Mia-Assistant is visible in the chatbot
description: From now on, information about the model used by Mia-Assistant is visible to users interacting with the chatbot.

improvements.title: Secrets support in Flow Manager Configurator
description: Starting from version `2.7.0` of the Flow Manager service, it is now possible to instruct the service to use **secrets** in specific parts of the configuration provided via the Configurator.
For details on how to use this feature, please refer to the [official documentation](/docs/products/console/api-console/api-design/flow-manager-configurator/overview#secrets).

improvements.title: Support for Empty Dir volumes
description: Added support to specify an empty dir mount point for a service and/or its additional containers

bugFixes: It has been fixed a bug that was showing a blank page when entering the Console for the first time

improvements.title: Back-kit
description: The new version `v1.5.18` of the back-kit library is available!
Refer to back-kit [changelog](/docs/products/microfrontend-composer/back-kit/changelog) for finer-grained details of new versions.

improvements.title: Support for Title and Content Interpolation in `bk-notifications`
description: Added possibility to interpolate title and content of the `bk-notifications` component

bugFixes: Fixed `bk-table` wrong column widths introduced with the new Chrome/Chromium version

improvements.title: Flow Manager Service 2.7.0
description: The new version `2.7.0` of the Flow Manager Service is available!
The Flow Manager supports the resolution of Kubernetes secrets for a set of configuration properties.
Please refer to the [official documentation](/docs/runtime-components/plugins/flow-manager-service/30_configuration#secrets-resolution) for more details.

improvements.title: FHIR Adapter 1.2.0
description: The new version `1.2.0` of the FHIR Adapter is available!
This version adds support for bundle transactions, that can be triggered by a request to the new `POST /transaction/:transactionId` endpoint.

bugFixes: Flow Manager: Fix errors that occur during the deep merge hook execution are now properly logged by the service.
